about.description:
I work creating digital-media applications and content, combining my design and engineering skills, such as researching and programming, to develop high quality solutions, experiences and graphic pieces.

Daily learning to improve and innovate in my projects is my main goal, so I'm in constant practicing and studying in order to achieve it.

I also consider myself having leadership aptitudes, showing compromise, responsability and well teamworking at projects to carry out.
